item.description:
In this meeting we will first introduce ourselves and tell where are spiritual lives have been, were we are now, and where we want to be or what we are working toward. Then discussion of what you are interested in. If anyone wants to give a brief talk on any spiritual subject it is welcome.  Then there will be a short talk on Powerful Meditation Techniques.

Soul ==> Align ==> Karma ==> Network ==> Destiny

Act from the DIVINE SELF, not the little self.  If not tuned in, a thousand acts may be worthless; when in tune each act is divine.

God and Enlightenment are all around.  Our thoughts can be blocking it out.  Our thoughts may be a form of delusion blocking enlightenment out.   - STOP THINKING

Here is a link to hundreds of free online classic spiritual books.
http://divinelibrary.org/archives.htm#TopOfPage"
item.how_to_find_us: Corner of Walden St and Mass Ave.
item.name: Intros, Personal Paths, Discussion, Powerful Meditation Techniques
